tool_description: PokéAPI provides a RESTful API interface to highly detailed objects built from thousands of lines of data related to Pokémon.
title: PokéAPI

api_list.name: get_berry
api_list.description: Get information about a specific berry by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the berry to retrieve.

api_list.name: get_berry_firmness
api_list.description: Get information about a specified berry firmness by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the berry firmness to retrieve.

api_list.name: get_berry_flavor
api_list.description: Get information about a specific berry flavor by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the berry flavor to retrieve.

api_list.name: get_ability
api_list.description: Get details about a specific Pokémon ability by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the ability to retrieve.

api_list.name: get_pokemon
api_list.description: Get details about a specific Pokémon by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the Pokémon to retrieve.

api_list.name: get_type
api_list.description: Get details about a specific Pokémon type by ID or name.

required_parameters.name: id_or_name
required_parameters.description: The ID or name of the Pokémon type to retrieve.
